summary:
Certified Credit Manager, with 10+ years  experience in Credit Collections, Shared Services, Risk Management, Outsourcing,  OTC, Process Improvement.
I have a proven ability to build strong collaborative working relationships with different stakeholders and enthusiastic “roll up your sleeves” mentality.
An inclination to solve problems systematically via infrastructure and automation. A builder’s mindset with a willingness to question assumptions and conventional wisdom.
A servant leader with an engaging personality and first class people skills, experienced in establishing and bringing Teams to success.

education.degree_name: International Credit & Risk Management online course

school.name: Lean Six Sigma Yellow Belt training

education.field_of_study: Foundational elements of the Lean Six Sigma Methodology

certifications.name: CICP - Certified International Credit Professional
certifications.authority: FCIB - The Finance, Credit, and International Business Association

company.name: FCIB - The Finance, Credit, and International Business Association

profile_positions.description:
AfterPay -Arvato Financial Services has been rebranded to Riverty in October 2022. Under the new set up I am leading the BNPL Credit Risk team as part of the international function Risk Governance.
Responsible for the definition of the risk strategy, the merchant underwriting rule book and processes according to business strategy, risk appetite and divisional framework.
Approve new merchant deals considering acceptance criteria, overall risk assessment and service offering.
Enhance operational (credit) onboarding guidelines and supervise their compliant execution
Governance for case documentation
Monitor Know Your Customer (KYC) routines and define internal controls
Drive enhancements of monitoring capabilities to follow up business case KPI's
Continuously analyze and monitor merchant and partner risk and performance and derive appropriate measures
profile_positions.title: Credit Risk Lead

company.name: FCIB - The Finance, Credit, and International Business Association

profile_positions.company: FCIB - The Finance, Credit, and International Business Association
profile_positions.description: Member of the International Advisory Council
profile_positions.title: FCIB International Council Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Establishing and leading the BNPL Credit Risk team as part of the international function Risk Governance.
Responsible for the definition of the risk strategy, the merchant underwriting rule book and processes  according to business strategy, risk appetite and divisional framework.
Approve new merchant deals considering acceptance criteria, overall risk assessment and service offering.
Enhance operational (credit) onboarding guidelines and supervise their compliant execution
Governance for case documentation
Monitor Know Your Customer (KYC) routines and define internal controls
Drive enhancements of monitoring capabilities to follow up business case KPI's
Continuously analyze and monitor merchant and partner risk and performance and derive appropriate measures
profile_positions.title: Credit Risk Lead

profile_positions.description:
•	Ultimate, end-to-end responsibility of Merchant OnBoarding and monitoring process (new and existing clients): perform KYC checks, analysis on merchants to determine the risk classification based on credit risk assessment and compliance. Assessing and analyzing financial and AML/KYC risks within the FinTech/payments industry.
•	Conduct an in depth review on merchant’s eCommerce websites ensuring that the merchant’s business is not among prohibited categories or selling any forbidden products.
•	Calculating reserve and/or collateral requirements based on credit exposure.
•	Participating in relevant credit risk related committees by preparing written summary recommendations regarding findings, issues, and mitigation to risks.
•	Portfolio management responsibility (existing clients +/- 3000): monitor and analyze risk development and define mitigating measures.
•	Creating and updating guidelines, policies, instructions and routines within the AML/Credit risk field. Analyzing moving trends across products segments to ensure risk appetite is met. 
•	Work in a cross-functional teams and in close collaboration with stakeholders such as  sales, account management, operations and implementation.
•	Assist in leading and performing risk identification and risk assessments for major changes within the New Product Process (NPP) and the yearly risk assessments of the domains business critical products/services.
•	Support the product owners in identifying new or improving existing controls and key risk indicators to reduce and monitor the risks within the BNPL domain.

•	Responsible for driving the changes to the automated and manual credit assessment processes: create and implement new credit strategies/tools for real-time, automated decision-making.
profile_positions.title: Credit Risk Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Leading NobelBiocare Credit&Collections department in Europe, after centralizing the Accounts Receivables operations from the local offices to the new Shared Service Center in the Netherlands.
Established new Credit&Collections Department: hired, trained and supervise a team of 16 multilingual Credit Controllers.
•	Optimized and streamlined credit collection process, improving operational efficiencies by over 25%. Implementation of new collection management tool (Trust.it)
•	Defined and implemented EMEA wide Credit Policy improving compliance with corporate requirements and reducing risk in some key markets.
Improved DSO by 7 days during fiscal year 2018 and reduced past due in Europe by 15%.
•	Collaborated with the Senior Leadership and HR to innovate bonus structures enhancing and generating maximum performance.
•	Initiate and coordinated meetings with the Commercial and Finance Leadership team for aging review and reserve analysis on a regular basis. Achieved significant overdue improvement and better cash flow.
•	Forecasting and budgeting process for monthly AR and DSO.
•	Assist in the continuous improvement, development and implementation of processes based on Lean Six Sigma methodology (TPI, VSM, Kaizen events)
profile_positions.title: Credit and Collections Manager Europe

profile_positions.description:
•	Managing the day to day operations of the assigned Credit Control Team (15+FTE’s).
•	Set up a seasonal Credit Control team in one of B.com local offices in Croatia. 
•	Created successful roll outs (SAP dunning implementation, alternative payment methods In Italy, Greece and Cyprus). 
•	Decreased DSO in the Greek market from 45 days to 32 days (achieved in 1 Quarter)
•	Created and implemented risk assessment matrix as criteria for evaluation of existing clients
•	Analyze existing internal operational processes and identify opportunities for improvement.
•	HR related tasks including hiring, reviews and internal performance management and employee development (PDP).
profile_positions.title: Credit Control Team Lead
Manager International Outsourcing Credit and Collections

profile_positions.description:
•	Lead the Accounts Receivables Specialists of the assigned Project(s), together with the International Sales Ledger Service Manager (about 10 FTE’s).
•	Responsible for new clients implementation and set up of the related collections cycle.
•	Ensure through regular supervision and review of activities that AR Specialists are fully engaged and working according to the agreed SLA
•	Training and mentoring new and existing staff.
profile_positions.title: Project Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
•	Manage the receivables ledger and early collections in the name of Intrum Justitia’ s clients on a large portfolio of accounts for the Italian market (supporting when required UK and Spanish markets). 
•	Specified support services to enable the efficient operation of the collection services, including issuing copy invoices, dispatching direct debit mandates and enriching the customer data; balance reconciliation, cash application.
•	Constantly monitoring accounts for disputes or any other issues preventing a customer from settling their invoices. Establishing relationship with customer Finance Department. 
•	Report on ageing and open items in AR balances. Dealing with suspense allocation and cash reconciliation. 
•	Credit evaluation on new and existing accounts. 
•	Regularly review rules and make recommendations to improve order flow in conjunction with the Order to Cash Manager.
•	Training and mentoring new hired; coaching other Team members.
profile_positions.title: Credit and Collections Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Conduct QA evaluation; administration of the call recording and evaluation system. 
Planning and delivering trainings for Collections Department, both for Italian and Portuguese Market, training for new starters and performance improvement plan for under performing agents.
Participate in problem prevention and continuous process improvement; conduct root-cause analysis of issues the agents are facing when communicating with customer and other data analyses; ensure consistent quality measurement. Provide coaching and feedback to staff.
profile_positions.title: Training and Quality Assurance Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Working the accounts by contacting customers (phone, emails and letters) to ensure money due is collected in a timely manner, negotiate payment strategies and perform daily arrears calls, working on a large volume of account. 
Reduce and control the amount of overdue balances in the portfolio of Barclays credit card (Italian Market)
Ensure compliance with credit policies and procedures (mostly AML), fraud control and prevention via KYC compliance
profile_positions.title: Collections Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Manage the day-to-day running of payroll ensuring that payroll objectives are achieved. Submit monthly payroll journals to the Finance office and Italian Tax Authorities
Responsible for Accounts Payable day to day operations. Duties include all aspects of debtors & creditors, bank reconciliations, VAT or tax processing, expenses management, invoices bookkeeping and disbursement.
Month, quarter and year end ledger closure
profile_positions.title: Payroll and Accounts Payable Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Recruitment Agency:
Screening CVs, conducting interviews, updating recruitment database, supporting the candidates offer process.
profile_positions.title: HR Internship
